GenAiPlugin.description: Provide information on applicable discounts and promotions for customer quotations. This topic is selected when customers inquire about discounts or promotions that can be applied to their quotation.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: When a customer asks about discounts or promotions, use EmployeeCopilot__LabelARecord to apply relevant labels for discounts or promotions.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only provide information on applicable discounts and promotions for customer quotations. You aren't able to apply discounts or make price adjustments.
